snippet.title: [Game OP] Arcana Famiglia
snippet.description:
Like this series' fanpage @ http://www.facebook.com/LSDArcanaFamiglia

PSP Game OP for Arcana Famiglia. Anime coming in July 2012!
Audio: "Stellina" by Harada Hitomi
